channel.title: Prince, Princess, Seeker, Duchess, Mashal changes
channel.description:
**Prince:** Type changed to Special(because Prince is Social and Offensive and Killing) **Princess:** >**Passive: Royal Blood** **Day ability 1: Different Focus(1 use)**:Narrow down the class type to 2 types this night(Killer/Support)/(Social/Offensive)/(Special/Investigative) **Day ability 2:Royal Suspicion(Unlimited uses, one target)**: If you ever die at night your target will be at trial after the selection of a new King(if there is one, otherwise immediately). This can target the King. 2 conflicting suspicions will negate these effects, but they will be made public. **Night ability 1:Flirt(unlimited uses)** Narrow down the class type of your target to 3 options.(Killer/Support/Offensive)/(Social/Special/Investigative) **Night ability 2:Will-o-wisp(3 uses)**:You will be notified if your target visits someone with an attack.
**Seeker, Duchess, Marshal**: Special and Killing classes now return Special/Killing. Changes: >**Seeker:Expose(2 uses)** Reveal to the Cult the person the Prince targets tonight. Reveal to the Cult the names of people currently being poisoned or bleeding.
>**Marshal:Expose(3 uses)** Reveal to the Unseen the person the Prince imprisons tonight. Reveal to the Unseen the names of people currently being poisoned or bleeding.**
>**Duchess:Day Ability 1:Dark Wisp(2 uses)** The Unseen will appear as Blue Dragon tonight.

item.title: Prince, Princess, Seeker, Duchess, Mashal changes
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
TBH my biggest problem with it is that it is a day ability. So it can stop any play by nature of being too powerful. Make it a modifier on the main ability and we are good.

Read full topic
item.source: Prince, Princess, Seeker, Duchess, Mashal changes

item.title: Prince, Princess, Seeker, Duchess, Mashal changes
item.dc:creator: RawkHawk
item.description:
Here’s the problem: you’re too focused in on “What if princess checks me?” You’re not actually realizing the myriad of other problems with the alch claim. What if butler tries to occupy you? Drunk debauch you? Observer follow you? You’re nerfing one of the few good utilities of the princess, just so nks can have marginally better claim space. While princess isn’t useless, she’s significantly worse, and is very lack luster as a class.

Princess does not need to be changed.

Read full topic
item.source: Prince, Princess, Seeker, Duchess, Mashal changes

item.title: Prince, Princess, Seeker, Duchess, Mashal changes
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Firelitten:

It doesn’t protect against the cult.

It protects against the cult leader.

Unknown:

YAAAAY

OP.

It’s only 2 uses. It could even be reduced to 1 use.

Unknown:

Special? MM/CL; BD wins if Prince is alive.

Another reason to make prince special. And finding CL isn’t that big of an issue for cult.

Unknown:

Offensive? Likely BD.

Invoker and converted unseen classes.

Unknown:

Killer? Report to Prince. Prince exes.

Knight and hunter. Killing them will make it impossible for the BD to kill.

Read full topic
item.source: Prince, Princess, Seeker, Duchess, Mashal changes

item.title: Prince, Princess, Seeker, Duchess, Mashal changes
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
No not useless.
You have Wisp.
You can still catch some fakeclaims.
Do you support making Flirt 2-options but (K/Su)/(So/O)/(Sp/I) instead?

item.title: Prince, Princess, Seeker, Duchess, Mashal changes
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
RHCube:

I was thinking of a similar buff.

Charm(day)(2 use) - determine your target’s exact class type.

If this still isn’t enough, then maybe princess could be given a 1 or 2 use day faction check.

YAAAAY
OP.
Special? MM/CL; BD wins if Prince is alive.
Invest? Not MM/CL.
Offensive? Likely BD.
Social? Likely BD/Scorned/Fool
Killer? Report to Prince. Prince exes.
Support? Probably not bad.

And Princess gets more trusted.

Did you forget that Princess has Royal Blood?

Read full topic

item.description:

item.source: Prince, Princess, Seeker, Duchess, Mashal changes

item.title: Prince, Princess, Seeker, Duchess, Mashal changes
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Firelitten:

Observer is fine.

Except for window peek being totally unrelated to follow. It should just be changed so it determines what classes visit your target.

Firelitten:

Sheriffs are counters to unseen not to the neuts

That’s the main problem with sheriff and paladin though. Evil factions shouldn’t have a soft counter.

Firelitten:

I never saw a related ability between smite and test faith. Test faith you want to target a cult. Smite you want to target a non cultist which will be likely converted

One finds cultists, the other protects against the cult.

Read full topic
